We have 20 hostels in Chengdu with an average rating of 8.4 based on 10,297 reviews 20 of 20 properties available in Chengdu

  • 1

About Chengdu

Read customer reviews of all our Chengdu hostels and find the perfect place to stay while exploring the Giant Panda sanctuary, Quingyang Gong Daoist Temple, Jinli Street and poet Da Fu’s 1,200-year-old thatched cottage. Don’t miss a visit to Mount Emei, a UNESCO World Heritage Site - especially the Giant Buddha of Leshan!
